one.title: Q1. How do I purchase credits?

stepOne.contentOne: Step 1: From the Recruitment Centre dashboard, click on

stepTwo.contentTwo: your preferred package from the menu, and click on

two.title: Q2. How do I make payment for a JobsDB package with a credit card?
two.subTitle: To make payment using a credit card, follow the steps below:

stepTwo.contentOne: 2.	Fill in your credit card information such as card number, name on card, expiration date, and card verification code (CVC).

three.title: Q3. Can I perform a transaction through Internet banking?
three.subTitle: Yes. Payment can be made by HSBC / Hang Seng Internet Banking (Hong Kong)

stepThree.contentOne: •	Bill Type (賬單類別) : 01 Job Ad Posting (01招聘廣告)

stepFour.contentOne: •	Bill Payee Account No. (with Merchant) (賬單戶口號碼) : 13-Digit Payment reference

four.title: Q4. How do I perform an online bank transfer?
four.note: Note: Once the transaction is successful, please email the receipt to

stepOne.contentOne: •	Account Name: Jobs DB Hong Kong Limited

stepTwo.contentOne: •	Bank Name: The Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation

stepFour.contentOne: •	Remarks or Message to Beneficiary: 13-Digit Payment Reference

five.title: Q5. Can I perform a transaction through the ATM?
five.subTitle: Yes. Payment can be made via ATM operated by
five.subTitleTwo: The maximum cash payment per transaction is HK$ 5,000.

stepFour.contentOne: •	Bill Account No. (賬單號碼) : 13-Digit Payment Reference

six.title: Q6. How do I make payment for a JobsDB package with a cheque?
six.note: Note: Post-dated cheques are not accepted. Kindly attach your cheque to the Payment Advice (with barcode) and send it to us.

stepTwo.contentBlod: P.O. Box 10752, General Post Office, Hong Kong

seven.title: Q7. Can I perform a transaction through Mobile banking?
seven.subTitle: Yes. Payment can be made by
seven.subTitleBlod: HSBC / Hang Seng Mobile Banking (Hong Kong)

stepThree.contentOne: •	Merchant (商户) : JOBSDB HK LTD; or enter 432 when asked for Merchant Code (商戶編號)

stepFive.contentOne: •	Bill Type (賬單類別) : 01 Job Ad Posting (01招聘廣告)

stepFour.contentOne: •	Bill Payee Account No. (with Merchant) (賬單戶口號碼) : 13-Digit Payment reference

eight.title: Q8. How to edit my billing details?

stepOne.contentOne: To change the billing contact for your account:

stepTwo.contentTwo: with the updated contact person name, position title, email address and contact number. We will revert to you within 1 working day.

stepThree.contentOne: To change the billing address for your account:

stepFour.contentTwo: with proof of the updated address. We will revert to you within 1 working day.
